website_summaries.verdict: These multicolored cones are perfect for all types of speed and agility drills, and they're easy to take with you wherever you go.
pros: Set of five stackable cones available in five bright colors
Low profile and flexible plastic design help keep the cones from breaking
Mesh bag and plastic carrying stand included
cons: Some complaints about the color wearing off in the sun
May not easily bounce back to their original shape if stepped on

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for 50 Flexible Multi Color Disc ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for 50 Flexible Multi Color Disc Cones, this is the product for you. There were 50. They were in the shape of a cone. There were 5 different colors. They are very flexible. However, if you are looking to avoid multiple follow up emails from the supplier begging for a 5 star review, you should probably look else where.
customer_reviews.author: JT High

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these with a soccer team of 5 year old boys. They are visible in even tall grass and get the job done. They are kind of slippery when stacked so the storage bag and stacking pole they come with are totally necessary. They are a very thin plastic and are very flexible. The kids basically see them as a stepping pad. No matter how many times we tell them not to. The disc will get distorted from the abuse but you can just pop them back into shape. I've only used them once so far, so we will have to see how long they hold up. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DeRosa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy colorful cones
customer_reviews.text: They are great colors that do the job as cones. They are pretty soft plastic so I'm sure that they won't crack very easily which is a plus. The only complaint is the mesh bag they came in is super flimsy and already ripped in one corner on first try putting them back in. But you don't really need a bag because it comes with the stacking tray.. I think my toddler played with them just as much as the older kids!
customer_reviews.author: D.P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tennis
customer_reviews.text: These cones worked out great for tennis targets. The cones are very flexible and bounce back when stepped on. There were more than enough to set out corner targets and color drills. Great price and should last longer than needed. Included stand is a great plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great For Soccer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for soccer practice and they work great. They are not too tall that they blow over in the wind. The multi colors makes it easy to differentiate drills. When these are stepped on, they do not break. I have had mine for about a year and they are all still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Dog training equipment
customer_reviews.text: This dog training equipment is exactly what we needed to train multiple dogs and keep them and their owners in a contained environment. Works great. When I opened the package, I was surprised to see all the cones so tightly together. Easy to pull apart, use and re-stack.
customer_reviews.author: sigmond

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for Coaching Any Sport!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and shipping was super fast! I coach my 5 year old's soccer team. The kids love these disc cones! Coaching with the discs makes practice so much easier to teach skills. For example, the kids can place a soccer ball on top of a disc and practice kicking the ball with their laces and "not" their toes. The uses of these disc cones are endless. They are flexible/bendable so it would be very difficult to break them. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun, have yet to blow away, and a great price -- colors tend to fade quickly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to practice soccer in the backyard with my kids. They are very sturdy and don't blow away in the wind. The kids also like the color options and use them to create their own fields and invent new types of backyard games. My only complaint is that they faded a lot just from one summer of use and we rarely left them out after using (most colors are now a faded yellow even if they started bright red or green). Can't complaint too much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerMel

customer_reviews.title: Must have for soccer training
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this set. Very easy to pull of cones for training drills, grids, and warmups. I rarely use the blue color because in low light, it blends with green grass too much. Happy with this product and carrying stand
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice5OH

customer_reviews.title: Great cones
customer_reviews.text: I've yet to find a perfect training cone, but these seem like they will last for a few years and do what is needed for this volunteer coach. The price is great for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. The cone quality was great. Colors were strong and bold. I'm really happy with this purchase. It was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Husby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soccer!
customer_reviews.text: Use them for my 4 year old and I (and his time) to practice soccer drills. They are a tad thinner than I expected but it hasn't effected their performance. They are also pretty slippery to pick up, but thankfully you will receive a nice holder for them that helps avoid this problem. Work great!! Would definitely recommend for soccer!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em!
customer_reviews.text: Have used many different brands in the past. This Disc Cone Set is equal to or better than any I have used. These have been used in 10 Practices with U-10, U-8 and U-6 age groups and have held up great. They have taken a lot of abuse. Thank you for a great product at a better price!
customer_reviews.author: plb

customer_reviews.title: Great for coaching young kids
customer_reviews.text: I coached soccer for young kids and this made practices more fun for everybody. You can make up so many games to help with coordination and skill. Now over a year later and they have held up great and my kids still play with them.
customer_reviews.author: A. MCDANIEL

customer_reviews.title: these bright colors seemed to me to be easy to see on the boundary marker
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my carpet cleaning business. With a blacklight, I marked urine areas that need deeper treatment. On another note, these bright colors seemed to me to be easy to see on the boundary marker!
customer_reviews.author: outdoor lover

customer_reviews.title: Very Flexible and Durable! 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: These disc cones came in super fast thanks to Amazon Prime👍! The cones were just as described and super flexible. Our other cones in the past (another brand) have faded within a year so I will update after a year to see if these fade. The material of these cones seem to be good quality and so far my soccer kids haven't destroyed them...a plus with them. One set that we purchased at a retail sports store lasted about 1 week. So far this set still looks new and is holding up well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, variety of colors and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These cones have been great for running practices for my pre K-Kindergarten soccer team. The different bright colors help the little ones know where to go. This srt is a great value! The 50 cones in this set allow me to set up different stations around the field. And the fact that they are flexible prevents damage when they are stepped on or played with (they make a very nice hat), which they frequently are. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my two and a half year old grandson to create a little road for his motorized car. He was thrilled to drive around the cones. It also served as a game to sort colors. Finally, it was fun to stack them back on the peg. So many uses for this little gem!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and the holder is a handy tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for our U8 team, a variety of colors to help direct them. I just wish I had purchased these sooner! Great quality, and the holder is a handy tool as well.
customer_reviews.author: BourneAgain

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Dope, not gunna lie!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent durability, bought these last year and still kicking, literally. The holder makes it super easy to transport which I really enjoy over a bag holder. One thing I added was a big carabeaner to the top of the holder to stop the cones from coming off. Great addition and makes the product perfect to throw in your trunk. Great product, excellent customer service and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: Good comes at a good price. I like having different colors and both a holder and a bag to keep them from spilling all over my trunk. I’ve only used them a couple times. But look forward to frequent use
customer_reviews.author: Manunitedfan6

customer_reviews.title: The handle and carrying bag are AWESOME! They teammates love collecting them and placing them ...
customer_reviews.text: The cones themselves are thinner than I expected, They don't hold their shape as well as other brands when stepped on. Whiching during soccer practice they will get stepped on. The handle and carrying bag are AWESOME! They teammates love collecting them and placing them on the handle. (Youth 7/8 boys Recreational soccer)
customer_reviews.author: Shotgun Anne

customer_reviews.title: I am a huge futbol/soccer fan and I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge futbol/soccer fan and I am a coach of 2 U-10 boys teams right now. Cones and discs are something that get destroyed on a regular basis with my teams. This quality of these has already been put to the test, and so far is standing up to the rigors of 30 10 year old boys running drills through them the past 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time and are what as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cones are sturdy. The carrier and bag make transporting them to the field convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bruinsma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any sports activity
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any sports activity. I use them for soccer and there are big enough to see on the field but not too big to where the players keep stepping on them. The different colors help out too with different parts of a drill. I ordered one set but 10 of each color was not enough, so I ordered another. 20 of each color works perfectly for the soccer drills I do for my team.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Football Practice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cones. I coach 5 on 5 youth flag football and use these cones to teach the concept of route running and zone defense to the kids at practice. The different colors help the kids stick to their asssignments/routes instead of trying to play street ball every play.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Boniface

customer_reviews.title: It is very neon and almost looks like highlighter yellow
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for a team building exercise where it was important to differentiate the colors. Unfortunately, the green is not as pictured. It is very neon and almost looks like highlighter yellow. This was confusing for our particular use. Other than that, they are as described. It is nice that they have a stand and bag to keep them organized.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Cohu

customer_reviews.title: Great value for these quality cones.
customer_reviews.text: Abxo Tech's soccer 50 cones are really a steal. Usually you get half of the number of cones for the price. The cones are well made. The flexibility should help them held up to stepping on. The cones stays in place on the turf. The carrying bag is also handy to have. I'd definitely would recommend them for soccer drills.
customer_reviews.author: sleepysauruz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This disc cone set is exactly what I needed for my grandchild. She had something similar in her dance class and really enjoyed it. I wanted her to have it to practice and play at home. She loves it. The colors are really nice and it’s sturdy enough for the kids to hop over it . Excellent transaction.

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors but they are flimsy. I was a little disappointed because I thought the disc cones would be heavier.

customer_reviews.title: Like the fact they are flexible and do not damage ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used the cones for a week at football practice. Like the fact they are flexible and do not damage when stepped on by the kids. The five different colors are a huge plus. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all around use
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as guiding tools for teaching young kids how to ride a horse. The soft durable plastic bounces right back into shape after getting stepped on by a horse time and time again.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Good Product for good price even though the orange color doesn't match the rest of the colors - it's transparent while the other colors are solid.

customer_reviews.title: Happy coach
customer_reviews.text: These disc cones came just as advertised. As a soccer coach, having different colors of cones really helps me to get my instructions to the team in an efficient manner. "Run to the red code and then to the blue, etc". The carrying stand and the bag are a nice touch.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sports and Games
customer_reviews.text: We use these for sports practice drills and games to identify boundaries. The multiple colors are great and we love the carrying case.

customer_reviews.title: Disc Cone Set for Soccer Practice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my seven year old granddaughter as she just began soccer this year and most of her team played last year. This gives her an opportunity to practice her ball control during her own time. These work perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: A must have for coaches
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I replace cones almost every season. This set is reasonably priced, arrived quickly and has color variety for different functions on the field making setup and transition between exercises very easy to understand.

customer_reviews.title: nice cones
customer_reviews.text: good cones, not as sturdy as some, but they are usable.

customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our karate studio, and use them for agility and balance training. The cones are sturdy, but very pliable - perfect for balance on heads for balance exercises! Very happy with the quality, price and shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied that the order arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied that the order arrived quickly. Main critique would be the yellow and green cones are not as distinct as shown, they look very similar and the red and orange cones also look very similar. Not a major issue but just some feedback for future buyers.

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Nice and flexible. They can't withstand a new puppy chewing on them so be careful if you have a puppy around.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my brother and he loves them. They are very high quality and the color variation gives you a lot of flexibility with what you do with them. 10/10 recommend.

product_meta.title: Disc Cone Set of 50 Flexible Multi Color (Red, Blue, Yellow, Green, Orange) Cones, With Plastic Carrier To Take It With You Everywhere – Perfect For Soccer, Football & Any Ball Game To Mark
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL TRAINING EQUIPMENT – Abco disc cones are an essential training accessory for any coach’s arsenal as they help in training and development of players at all levels. The cones can be used on the basketball court and football field for outlining agility drills, on the soccer field as boundary line markers, on a running track as course markers, or for a wide variety of other marking needs in tennis, football, La crosse, hockey, etc.

STACKABLE – The cones come in a set of 50 pieces and have low profile (dimensions 2” tall X 7 3/5 “) which is safe for any sports - preferred by many professional coaches and trainers. The cones can be stacked together for ease of storage and portability – making them extremely convenient to carry along in a bag.

MULTIPLE COLOURS – The set of 50 cones come in 5 different colors – 10 yellow, 10 red, 10 blue, 10 orange and 10 light green. The colors are thoughtfully chosen such that they are bright enough to be clearly visible from a far distance but do not become a distraction in any way.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND MULTIFUNCTIONAL – The disc cones are extremely light weight and thus enhance the portability even further. Moreover, these can also be used for a wide variety of other purposes like for creating boundaries in a parking lot, as dividers for managing traffic or in any event for creating clear markings. The high quality material makes them quite durable and also suitable for use on any surface – be it grass, gym floors, concrete, or anything else.

100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We also offer you 100% risk-free satisfaction guarantee to let you buy with confidence; no questions asked. However, we are quite sure that these cones will prove to be extremely useful for training purposes and you will love yourselves for the decision of buying them.
